titleStmt.title: The last sermon preached before his Maiesties funerals at Denmark house: on Tuesday the third of May. / By Phinees Hodson Dr of Diuinitie, one of his Maiesties chaplaines.
titleStmt.author: Hodson, Phineas, d. 1646.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for Hannah Barret,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
